params._protocolTreasury: Protocol treasury address for fee collection

returns._0: outstanding The outstanding amount (principal + interest - repaid)

returns.feePercentage: The protocol fee percentage in basis points
returns.feesCollected: Total fees collected and waiting to be withdrawn

returns._0: totalDue The total amount due (principal + interest)
True if loan is past due date

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateProtocolTreasury(address).details: Only owner can call this function

withdrawProtocolFees().details: Only owner can call this function

createLoanWithEth(uint256,uint8,uint256).notice: Create a new loan with ETH collateral

createLoanWithUsdt(uint256,uint256,uint8.notice: Create a new loan with USDT collateral

defaultLoan(uint256).notice: Mark loan as defaulted (after grace period)

getActiveLoanCount(address).notice: Get active loan count for user

getOutstandingAmount(uint256).notice: Get outstanding amount for a loan

getTotalDue(uint256).notice: Get total amount due for a loan

getUserLoans(address).notice: Get all loan IDs for a user

withdrawProtocolFees().notice: Withdraw collected protocol fees to treasury
